nodes.text:
(alias) function createWalletClient<transport extends Transport, chain extends Chain | undefined = undefined, accountOrAddress extends Account | Address | undefined = undefined, rpcSchema extends RpcSchema | undefined = undefined>(parameters: WalletClientConfig<transport, chain, accountOrAddress, rpcSchema>): WalletClient<transport, chain, ParseAccount<accountOrAddress>, rpcSchema>
import createWalletClient
nodes.docs:
Creates a Wallet Client with a given [Transport](https://viem.sh/docs/clients/intro) configured for a [Chain](https://viem.sh/docs/clients/chains).

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/clients/wallet

A Wallet Client is an interface to interact with [Ethereum Account(s)](https://ethereum.org/en/glossary/#account) and provides the ability to retrieve accounts, execute transactions, sign messages, etc. through [Wallet Actions](https://viem.sh/docs/actions/wallet/introduction).

The Wallet Client supports signing over:
- [JSON-RPC Accounts](https://viem.sh/docs/clients/wallet#json-rpc-accounts) (e.g. Browser Extension Wallets, WalletConnect, etc).
- [Local Accounts](https://viem.sh/docs/clients/wallet#local-accounts-private-key-mnemonic-etc) (e.g. private key/mnemonic wallets).

nodes.text:
(alias) function http<rpcSchema extends RpcSchema | undefined = undefined, raw extends boolean = false>(url?: string | undefined, config?: HttpTransportConfig<rpcSchema, raw>): HttpTransport<rpcSchema, raw>
import http
tags: Creates a HTTP transport that connects to a JSON-RPC API.

nodes.text:
(alias) function erc7739Actions<verifier extends Address | undefined = undefined>(parameters?: Erc7739ActionsParameters<verifier>): <transport extends Transport, chain extends Chain | undefined = Chain | undefined, account extends Account | undefined = Account | undefined>(client: Client<transport, chain, account>) => Erc7739Actions<account, verifier>
import erc7739Actions
nodes.docs: A suite of Actions based on [Solady contracts](https://github.com/Vectorized/solady).

A Wallet Client is an interface to interact with [Ethereum Account(s)](https://ethereum.org/en/glossary/#account) and provides the ability to retrieve accounts, execute transactions, sign messages, etc. through [Wallet Actions](https://viem.sh/docs/actions/wallet/introduction).

The Wallet Client supports signing over:

- [Local Accounts](https://viem.sh/docs/clients/wallet#local-accounts-private-key-mnemonic-etc) (e.g. private key/mnemonic wallets).

nodes.text:
(alias) erc7739Actions<undefined>(parameters?: Erc7739ActionsParameters<undefined> | undefined): <transport, chain, account>(client: Client<transport, chain, account>) => Erc7739Actions<account, undefined>
import erc7739Actions
nodes.docs: A suite of Actions based on [Solady contracts](https://github.com/Vectorized/solady).

Returns a list of account addresses owned by the wallet or client.

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/actions/wallet/getAddresses
- JSON-RPC Methods: [`eth_accounts`](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/apis/json-rpc/#eth_accounts)
tags: List of account addresses owned by the wallet or client. {@link GetAddressesReturnType}
